name: Midsummer Capital
overview: Midsummer Capital, LLC is an employee owned principal investment firm. The firm also provides financing and investment advisory services. It manages hedge funds for its clients. The firm invests in the public equity and alternative markets of the United States. It primarily invests in growth capital investments in exchange listed small and mid size companies through subscribing to private placement of convertible debt, quasi equity, and equity. The firm seeks to invest in companies that hold promising technology, product, or service with attractive market potential. It typically invests in companies with capital needs in between $5 million and $50 million and market capitalization between $50 million and $200 million. The firm can also provide follow-on financings. It does not offer distress financing to firms facing financial problems. Midsummer Capital is based in New York, New York.

funding_round.source_description: CEL-SCI SIGNS DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO RAISE $4.4 MILLION IN REGISTERED DIRECT OFFERING

Senesco Technologies, Inc. Announces Private Placement Financing for Gross Proceeds of $11.5 Million. Funds to be Utilized to Advance Lead Multiple Myeloma Drug Candidate into Phase 1b/2a Clinical Trial
